subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] FW: Re: Expectations
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Thanks!


>From: "Laura Kimberley" <gjk1rrfan@...>
>Reply-To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
>To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: [EVP-ITC] FW: Re: Expectations
>Date: Wed, 04 Apr 2007 15:23:15 -0000
>
>Frank,
>Congratulations!! That's wonderful and definitly great supporting
>news for you and a well deserved one my friend. keep up the
>wonderful work an the continuance for striving to connect and
>maintain for higher realms of communications!! I do believe there
>working with you very closely.
>
>Laura
>
>--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Frank Sumption" <franks-boxes@...>
>wrote:
> >
> > I am trying not to get a big head.  This was from the video tape
>interview
> > done Sunday.
> >
> >
> > >From: ---------------
> > >To: Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...>
> > >Subject: Re: Expectations
> > >Date: Tue, 3 Apr 2007 23:28:50 -0700 (PDT)
> > >
> > >Hi Frank,
> > >
> > >   The interview did go well. Sorry for any anxiety it may have
>caused but
> > >hopefully you are now comfortable with me. I am committed to
>honoring your
> > >intended purpose and today shared time with Mark Macy using your
>box and he
> > >is equally impressed. Mark only adheres to the research of
>contact with
> > >postive ethereal beings. You are considered by many to be an
>important
> > >pioneer in the field of ITC research.
> > >
> > >   Thank you for your time and trust. You have managed to break
>new ground
> > >and have joined the ranks of those that have made a real impact
>in
> > >facilitating communication with non physical intelligence.
> > >
> > >   Sincerely, Bill -----
